Text colors

```js
require("./demo.css");

const examples = ["primary", "secondary"];

<div className="demo-theme-container">
  {examples.map((text, index) => (
    <Theme text={text} key={index}>
      <Body2 className="demo-theme-item">text="{text}"</Body2>
    </Theme>
  ))}
</div>;
```

Background colors

```js
require("./demo.css");

const examples = [
  { background: "background", text: "text-primary-on-background" },
  { background: "primary-bg", text: "on-primary" },
  { background: "secondary-bg", text: "on-secondary" }
];

<div className="demo-theme-container">
  {examples.map((item, index) => (
    <Theme background={item.background} text={item.text} key={index}>
      <Body2 className="demo-theme-item">
        <span>background="{item.background}"</span>
        <br />
        <span>text="{item.text}"</span>
      </Body2>
    </Theme>
  ))}
</div>;
```

Text on background

```js
require("./demo.css");

<Theme background="background">
  <div className="demo-theme-text-styles">
    <Theme text="text-primary-on-background">Primary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-secondary-on-background">Secondary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-hint-on-background">Hint</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-disabled-on-background">Disabled</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-icon-on-background">
      <Icon>favorite</Icon>
    </Theme>
  </div>
</Theme>;
```

Text on light background

```js
require("./demo.css");

<div className="demo-theme-light">
  <div className="demo-theme-text-styles">
    <Theme text="text-primary-on-light">Primary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-secondary-on-light">Secondary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-hint-on-light">Hint</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-disabled-on-light">Disabled</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-icon-on-light">
      <Icon>favorite</Icon>
    </Theme>
  </div>
</div>;
```

Text on dark background

```js
require("./demo.css");

<div className="demo-theme-dark">
  <div className="demo-theme-text-styles">
    <Theme text="text-primary-on-dark">Primary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-secondary-on-dark">Secondary</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-hint-on-dark">Hint</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-disabled-on-dark">Disabled</Theme>
    <Theme text="text-icon-on-dark">
      <Icon>favorite</Icon>
    </Theme>
  </div>
</div>;
```
